explains: adj. 充满活力的，充满生机的，生气勃勃的；鲜艳的，醒目的；洪亮的，强劲的；颤抖的，震动的

sentences.en: The room was decorated in vibrant blues and greens.
sentences.cn: 那房间以鲜艳的蓝绿两色装饰。

sentences.en: Tom felt himself being drawn toward her vibrant personality.
sentences.cn: 汤姆感到自己正被她充满活力的个性所吸引。

sentences.en: A vibrant and growing economy does not improve everyone's quality of life.
sentences.cn: 一个生机勃发的经济体并不能提升每个人的生活质量。
